TopicTitle: Graphical bugs and rendering of trees/rocks

Articles.Content:
Hi, i'm back to KSP after years...so a lot of things are new to me. The graphical problems in particulars...

First thing it was a shadow problem, for now it's gone, so i thought it was the end of the glitches.

Today instead i discover that trees don't render. Basically i landed on a valley on Kerbin, and there were all these " gray bubbles" i don't know how to call them. I assumed they were rocks, since it was near the mountains.

Instead i went back to the tracking station, and back again to the vehicle...and "boom". Trees everywhere. (keep in mind that i knew that there are rocks, but not trees...it's many many years since i last played KSP)

I'll attach some pictures to this post to show this better. 

Also i've noticed that when you exit the tracking station the shape of Kerbin remains in the black screen for a fraction of second. I don't know if it's just another bug.

The only mods i have are "Mechjeb" and "Distance Objects Enhancement" (makes the sky more realistic near planets)

here are some screenshots

this is the terrain before landing

thanks in advance

EDIT: the pictures are NOT NSFW, i don't know why they're labeled in this way
